motd:
Welcome to LunaSea v5.1.1!

A small update to fix some minor bugs that have popped up over the past few months. Bigger things are planned in the future as development of LunaSea starts to pick up again, stay tuned!

changes: (ListView) Make padding around the end of infinite list loaders and icons more consistent
(Popup Menu) Positioning could get unaligned or broken if opened in specific views
(Router) OSlide transitions between pages could not occur on some devices
(Snackbar) Snackbars would not be shown in some cases
